name: Close Our Eyes (Original 2015 Game Online Co-Op Experiment)
name_original: Close Our Eyes (Original 2015 Game Online Co-Op Experiment)
description:
Took a 2015 game of mine (Close Your Eyes) and turned it into a 2-4 player online co-op experience as an experiment. Also includes my 2013 game, "Girl's Graveyard", similarly frankensteined into a 2-4 player online co-op experience.

Close Your Eyes you play as some little marshmallows who after escaping death row, encounter a strange game show host in an abandoned subway system, and can't seem to escape their past. With eight different endings, should be  90-200 minute experience.

Girl's Gaveyard is a challenging arcade styled game, though is that all it is? Collect candy for a bot you fancy, and see if you can reach the deeper depths.

This is a rough experiment, I'll be bug fixing things reported to me, but expected it to be a bit buggy, and as the games weren't originally designed for co-op (though I have made some small alterations to make it work out from a design perspective), this is more like a mod of the original games to allow people to play these games together rather than a game designed for it. Hope you enjoy, though!
